name.ja: ギガンティック＂チャンピオン＂サルガス

text.en:
2+ Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Gigantic "Champion" Sargas" by using 1 "Springans" Xyz Monster you control. (Transfer its materials to this card.) If this card has material: You can add 1 "Springans" or "Therion" card from your Deck to your hand. If a material(s) is detached from a monster on the field: You can target 1 card on the field; either destroy it or return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Gigantic "Champion" Sargas" once per turn.
